alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 2:41AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rankin, northwestern Simpson, eastern Hinds, north central Copiah and southern Madison Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pocahontas to near Jackson to near Byram to near Terry. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Richland around 245 AM CDT. Pearl, Ridgeland, Flowood and Annandale around 250 AM CDT. Madison, Canton and Gluckstadt around 255 AM CDT. Brandon, Florence, Fannin and Monterey around 300 AM CDT. Star, Goshen Springs and Piney Woods around 305 AM CDT. Pisgah around 310 AM CDT. Pelahatchie, Leesburg, Johns, Cato and Farmhaven around 315 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Mississippi.
